short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currency Converter - Converts one currency into another with one simple click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We support almost all the commonly circulating world currencies. These cover 99% of all UN recognized states and territories.

The conversion rates are updated every day. You can also use it without internet connectivity.

It is faster and secured currency conversion browser extension. 

If you have any issues, please raise it on github. 
https://github.com/tikamchand06/currency-converter/issues
